text: Taunton is a city in Bristol County, Massachusetts, United States. It is the seat of Bristol County and the hub of the Greater Taunton Area. As of the 2020 census, Taunton had 59,408 people living in it. The United States Census Bureau says that the city has an area of 48 square miles. ==Sister city== Taunton shares a sister city status with: * Taunton, Somerset, United Kingdom * Angra do Heroismo, Terceira, Azores, Portugal ==References== ==Other websites== *City of Taunton's Home Page *Taunton Area Chamber of Commerce's Official Home Page Category:Cities in Massachusetts Category:County seats in Massachusetts Category:1637 establishments Category:1630s establishments in Massachusetts
title: Taunton, Massachusetts
